alert.note: Alert for Plymouth; Woodbury (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 15 at 4:32PM CST until December 15 at 5:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Tornado Warning for... North central Woodbury County in west central Iowa... Eastern Plymouth County in northwestern Iowa... * Until 500 PM CST. * At 431 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Lawton, or 8 miles east of Sioux City, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Hinton around 440 PM CST. Merrill around 445 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this tornadic thunderstorm include Le Mars and Remsen. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
